title: Sourdough Discard Loaves
ingredients: 350g of all purpose or bread flour
directions: ~~ Morning bake at 9:30pm, evening bake at 7:30am ~~
Add all ingredients besides salt and combine to form a shaggy dough.
Cover and let rest for 30 minutes
Sprinkle salt over the dough right before kneading.
Knead with the stand mixer for 6-8 minutes.
Cover and let rest for 30 minutes
Ferment at room temperature (around 70°F) overnight or for at least 8 hours. Use the oven with light on if it’s exceptionally cold (or you’re in a rush)
Shape to your desired loaf shape. Long rolls are best
Let proof on counter for 1-2 hours or until dough has increased in size and proofed
Bake on steel or stone with steam at 400° for 15 mins.
Bake without steam at 400° for 15 mins or until desired crust color.
